model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Speaker A: I loaded up on repellent like you said and I also grabbed a few of those mosquito repellent bracelets, I figured why not!

[MEMORY]
User Description:
Speaker A is a personal trainer who loves going on camping trips, hiking, and looking for wild animals in the woods. Speaker A also enjoys cruising, with Cuba being a favorite destination. Speaker A is in good shape and leads hikes for camping groups. 

Relationship Description:
Speaker A and Speaker B have a friendly relationship, with Speaker B suggesting Speaker A try a cruise and recommending healthy and delicious food options. Speaker A invited Speaker B to join the gym, showing a level of casual interaction in the dialogue.

Event Description:
Events shared by Speaker A and Speaker B include Speaker A spotting a rare hawk on a hike, planning trips on the Appalachian Trail, and being nervous about full-day hikes. Speaker B, a computer programmer, suggested using mosquito repellent sprays with DEET to help Speaker A repel mosquitoes while hiking. Speaker B loves cruising and being outdoors but is scared of bugs and creepy crawlies. Speaker B recently got a new job working with computers.
